name: Buzz Cafe
notes: Buzz is a neighborhood cafe that's been serving coffee, tea, wine, breakfast, brunch, and desserts since 2003. Whether you visit the drive-thru or hang out on the patio with your dog, everyone can find a home at Buzz. Owners Haile and Yoko love to share their tastes with customers, and they believe not only in delicious drinks and food, but also fast, friendly service.
